summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city street. A motorcyclist appears from the left side and moves across the vehicles path. The motorcyclist then stops directly in front of the vehicle, causing the vehicle to decelerate rapidly.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates rapidly to avoid a collision with the motorcyclist who suddenly appears from the left side and stops directly in front of the vehicle.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A motorcyclist, approximately 2 meters away, moving across the vehicles path and stopping directly in front of the vehicle. 2) Front: A car, approximately 10 meters away, parked on the roadside.
